name: Project Tracker
description: Manage your projects the right wayIs it difficult to follow all your project tasks? Do you miss deadlines?By using this Notion Project Tracker you will assign tasks to specific projects, align them with goals and complete projects on time.You'll get:interlinked databases to manage all your projectsa database to create your projectsa database to track your tasksa database to save notesquick capture for tasks and notesThis Notion template will bring your project management skills to another level.
features: interlinked databases to manage all your projects; a database to create your projects; a database to track your tasks; a database to save notes; quick capture for tasks and notes
